name: Canta sabiá canta sabiá
lyrics:
Canta sabiá canta sabiá
as seis horas da noite e da manhã o sino da igreja toca
Canta sabiá canta sabiá
as seis horas da noite e da manhã o sino da igreja toca

na beira do rio tem a mata, aonde mora ,a passarada
na beira do rio tem a mata, aonde mora a passarada

translations.text:
Sing Sabiá Sing Sabiá
at six o'clock at night and in the morning the church bell rings
Sing Sabiá Sing Sabiá
at six o'clock at night and in the morning the church bell rings

by the river there is the forest, where you live, the walkway
on the riverbank there is the forest, where the birds live
